div.p: [...] to Kleon, greetings. As I have often told you, I have paid 1,000 dr. (through the bank) on the 7th of Thoyth to Etearchos for the works from Hephaistias up to Nautys, so that he can [...] for those working [...] has been written through this man [...] in one payment so that [...].
Year 31 [...]. From [...]. to Kleon. To Kleon Translation: B. Van Beek, P.Petr. Kleon 23
